app.title: Digital Voter Info Helper
app.subtitle: Step-by-step guide for Bangladesh Voter Services

nidRegistration.title: NID Registration
nidRegistration.description: How to register for a new National ID Card
steps: Visit the nearest Election Commission office
Collect the NID registration form
Fill the form with required information
Attach necessary documents (birth certificate, passport-sized photos, etc.)
Submit the application and collect receipt
Wait for verification process
Collect your NID card when notified

voterUpdate.title: Voter Information Update
steps: Visit the official Election Commission website
Log in with your existing NID number
Select 'Update Information' option
Choose which information to update (address, phone number, etc.)
Fill in the new information
Upload supporting documents if required
Submit your application and note the reference number

firstTimeVoter.title: First-time Voter Registration
steps: Check if you're eligible (must be 18 years or older)
Visit the local Election Commission office during registration period
Bring identification documents (birth certificate, etc.)
Fill out the voter registration form
Have your biometric data collected (photo, fingerprints)
Receive a confirmation slip
Check voter list during the verification period
Collect your voter ID card when ready
